game.name: Carton
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Trading Cards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Enter into the universe of cardboard, the ground, grass, trees, characters, everything is cardboard ! Make and explore your continent for finding a place where you can build your town. Survive of seasons and the night attack of goblins. Create a warrior group and assault the goblin castle !
game.shortDescriptionEn: Enter into the universe of cardboard, the ground, grass, trees, characters, everything is cardboard ! Make and explore your continent for finding a place where you can build your town. Survive of seasons and the night attack of goblins. Create a warrior group and assault the goblin castle !

reviewHighlights.text: I’ve spent some time with this game and honestly, it surprised me in a way I didn’t fully expect. I don’t want to sound dramatic, but there’s somethin...
